credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Tapered straight-sided blade, plain bolster. Handle with fluted joint at blade, surmounted by gold band, raised quatre foil and circle bands arranged lengthwise, silver crown and gold facetted bands on dressed silver; end with hollow crown of eight bands, four beaded, topped with ball-shaped finial with fleur-de-lis in gold.
name: Knife
